name: Gauntlet Of The Gods
description:
Created in 7 days for the 7DFPS Jam. 

Gauntlet Of The Gods is a First-Person Melee Based Rogue-Lite. 

Features:
  • There are a total of 8 upgrades with 2 levels to each. 
  • A total of 7 rooms (for now) that are randomly chosen. 
  • 3 Different types of enemies to thwart your path.
An Ample Moveset to play with:
  • Dashing
  • Combo Punching
  • Projectile Blasting
  • Blocking
Team

Reece L. Jones - Game Developer

Silkless Sounds - Music

Ethan D - Character Artist
